briefTitle: The Association of Hormonal Intake and Demographic Factors With Breast Cancer Risk. An Egyptian Case-controlled Study
officialTitle: The Association of Hormonal Intake and Demographic Factors With Breast Cancer Risk. An Egyptian Case-controlled Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age \> 18 and \< 70

Exclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosed with other concurrent malignancies.
* A prior history of another cancer.
